summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that use the Moto library to mock AWS SES v2 services, verifying client operations such as creating, retrieving, listing, and deleting contact lists and contacts, as well as sending plain text, HTML, and raw emails through a simulated SES endpoint.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the SES v2 client implementation without invoking real AWS resources, ensuring that contact management and email sending functionalities behave as expected.
